item.name: cm:Внутренние. Запросить номер
item.property: (doc.assocClass("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc") != null AND doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc","lecm-doc-dic-dt:registration-required") AND !doc.assocAttr("lecm-eds-document:document-type-assoc", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:auto-registration")) and user.currentUser().hasDynamicBusinessRole(doc.getNodeRef(), "BR_INITIATOR") and (doc.attr("lecm-document-aspects:reg-data-is-registered") == null or doc.attr("lecm-document-aspects:reg-data-is-registered") == false) and !@reservationWorkflowService.isReservationRunning(doc.getNodeRef()) and (doc.attr("lecm-reservation-aspects:isReserved") == null or doc.attr("lecm-reservation-aspects:isReserved") == false) and (doc.attr("lecm-statemachine-aspects:is-draft")==null || doc.attr("lecm-statemachine-aspects:is-draft")==false) and (doc.attr("lecm-statemachine-aspects:is-final")==null || doc.attr("lecm-statemachine-aspects:is-final")==false)
